job_tasks.phrase: implementing interactive games that integrate AI and real-time data processing
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core task of building software (games) that incorporates AI and data processing, fitting the definition of integrating features into applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Writing high-performance, scalable, high-quality code that adheres to best practices in software engineering
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to traditional software engineering practices focused on code quality, performance, and scalability.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating with cross-functional teams to translate complex educational concepts into elegant technical solutions
job_tasks.justification: This describes the software development process of taking requirements (educational concepts) and turning them into technical solutions, involving collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: Implementing robust integrations with third-party APIs and cloud-based services
job_tasks.justification: This clearly falls under software integration, specifically connecting to external services.

job_tasks.phrase: Delivering high-quality, performant game systems that serve as the primary interface for students in our online learning environment
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the delivery of functional software systems (game systems) with a focus on performance and user interface.

job_tasks.phrase: Continuously improving and optimizing our codebase to meet evolving educational and technological needs
job_tasks.justification: This describes ongoing software maintenance and enhancement, a core software engineering task.
This phrase indicates an understanding of the business domain (education) and the goal of creating specific types of experiences within it.

job_tasks.phrase: transforming abstract information into tangible, interactive experiences
job_tasks.justification: This describes the application of technical skills to solve a business problem within the educational context.

job_tasks.phrase: revolutionizing education through cutting-edge game development
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the strategic goal of using technology to impact the education sector.

soft_skills.justification: Explicitly mentions collaboration with other teams.

soft_skills.phrase: you will collaborate closely with a supportive product and backend team
soft_skills.justification: Reinforces the collaborative nature of the role.

soft_skills.phrase: push the boundaries of educational technology
soft_skills.justification: Indicates a drive for innovation and advancement in the field.

soft_skills.phrase: technical innovation is not just encouraged but required
soft_skills.justification: Highlights the requirement for innovation in the role.
Suggests a level of ownership and freedom in technical decision-making.

soft_skills.phrase: creating robust, efficient, and maintainable code that meets the most rigorous engineering standards
soft_skills.justification: Focuses on the quality and rigor of the solutions developed, implying problem-solving to meet high standards.
The company name itself suggests a focus on learning, and the role involves integrating AI, implying a need to learn and adapt to new technologies.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses heavily on traditional software engineering tasks (1.A.1), such as writing high-performance, scalable code, implementing integrations, and delivering game systems. While AI is mentioned as a component to be integrated ('integrate AI and real-time data processing'), the core responsibilities and emphasis are on the software development and engineering aspects rather than the development or specialization of AI models themselves. The role is about building software that *uses* AI, not about being an AI specialist. Therefore, 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' is the most fitting profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the core responsibilities being software engineering within the Unity game development context, with AI integration as a feature. The distinction between focusing on engineering excellence versus AI model development is explicitly stated, making the classification straightforward.
